sn4.1:1.6: Sādhu vatamhi mutto bodhiṃ samajjhagan”ti → sādhu ṭhito sato bodhiṃ samajjhaganti (bj, pts1ed, pts2ed); sādhu vatamhi satto bodhisamajjhagūti (sya-all, km)
sn4.1:3.4: suddhimaggā aparaddho → suddhimaggamaparaddho (bj, pts1ed, pts2ed); suddhimaggaṃ aparaddho (sya-all, km)
sn4.1:5.2: amaraṃ tapaṃ → aparaṃ tapaṃ (sya-all, pts1ed, pts2ed, mr)
